2001.name: Transcending Heart - Xia
2001.explain: A sacred item that contains miraculous transcendence energy, coming into existence thanks to the Compass of the Transcended. You can disassemble this item into Transcendence Spheres.

2002.name: Stellar Shards
2002.explain: A shard that contains a certain amount of transcendence energy. You can use it to enhance a hero's Void Imprint. Such shards can be earned by dismantling Transcending Spheres or completing explorations in the Realms Gate.

2003.name: Transcending Sphere
2003.explain: Summoned by the Compass of the Transcended, this holy relic contains the inscrutable power of the void. It can be converted into Crystals of Transcendence or Stellar Shards.

2004.name: Chaotic Egg
2004.explain: A mysterious egg that contains unidentified energy. Carefully incubate it to awaken the Starspawn in the Galactic Tree.

2005.name: Somber Egg
2005.explain: A mysterious egg that contains unidentified energy. Carefully incubate it to awaken the Starspawn in the Galactic Tree.

2006.name: Entangled Egg
2006.explain: A mysterious egg that contains unidentified energy. Carefully incubate it to awaken the Starspawn in the Galactic Tree.

2007.name: Enova Crystal
2007.explain: An extremely valuable crystal discovered in the void. You can exchange it for rewards in the Central Hall.

2008.name: Void Knar
2008.explain: An ancient plant that grows in the void. Its origin is still unidentified, although its remains can be used as an efficient fertilizer. You can use it to upgrade your Galactic Tree.

2009.name: Star Dust
2009.explain: An entity condensed from the chaotic energy in the void. You can use it to level up your Starspawns.

2010.name: Starspawn Core I
2010.explain: An energy crystal formed in the void. These crystals may vary in shape and size due to the different level of energy that they contain. You can use them to evolve your Starspawns.

2011.name: Starspawn Core II
2011.explain: An energy crystal formed in the void. These crystals may vary in shape and size due to the different level of energy that they contain. You can use them to evolve your Starspawns.

3500.name: Amber Coral
3500.explain: A resource produced from a special sanctuary land. This kind of coral is famous for its beautiful look.

3501.name: Jade Fruit
3501.explain: A resource produced from a special sanctuary land. The fruit is full of vigor.

3502.name: Dark Iron
3502.explain: A resource produced from a special sanctuary land. A metallic material extremely malleable.

3503.name: Pure Snowflake
3503.explain: A resource produced from a special sanctuary land. Can greatly influence the surrounding temperature continuously.

3504.name: Sacred Energy Crystal
3504.explain: A product obtained during the purifying process of Sacred Energy and can be produced in a designated building of Sanctuary Fortress.

3505.name: Astral Dust
3505.explain: A material that contains the magic power of the planet and can be produced in a designated building of Sanctuary Fortress.

3506.name: Slimy Tentacle
3506.explain: A byproduct obtained in a failed experiment and can be produced in a designated building of Sanctuary Fortress.

3507.name: Energy Transmission Element
3507.explain: A material that can transmit the energy efficiently, produced in a designated building of Sanctuary Fortress.

3508.name: Multifunctional Device
3508.explain: A material whose form and structure can be changed freely, produced in a designated building of Sanctuary Fortress.

3509.name: Illusion Spirit
3509.explain: A spirit born in simulated dreams and can be produced in a designated building of Sanctuary Fortress.

3510.name: Lethal Gaze
3510.explain: The harm brought by it can be removed by the right method. A material that can be produced in a designated building of Sanctuary Fortress.

3511.name: Microprocessor Unit
3511.explain: A basic element of an overspeed processor, produced in a designated building of Sanctuary Fortress.

3512.name: Energy Source Cube
3512.explain: A basic resource in the Sanctuary Fortress. A material extracted by special means with broad applicability.

3513.name: Debris Rubble
3513.explain: The building debris found in the Sanctuary Fortress. It's hard to restore its original appearance.

3514.name: Crimson Coral
3514.explain: A rare resource obtained from the collector in a special sanctuary land. The coral of this color is rarely seen.

3515.name: Pure Beryl
3515.explain: A rare resource obtained from the collector in a special sanctuary land. It's a symbol of vitality.

3516.name: Mysterious Skeleton
3516.explain: A rare resource obtained from the collector in a special sanctuary land. It's hard to tell what the creature is from the skeleton.

3517.name: Icebound Heart
3517.explain: A rare resource obtained from the collector in a special sanctuary land. It's hard to imagine under what force or temperature can a magic substance like this be formed.

3518.name: Polymer Essence
3518.explain: An essence commonly seen across the whole sanctuary area and can be extracted more easily from powerful targets.

3543.name: Multifunctional Device II
3543.explain: A material whose form and structure can be changed freely. Can be produced in the designated building of Sanctuary Fortress.

3544.name: Fluffy Spirit
3544.explain: A spirit lingering about the edge of dreams. Can be produced in the designated building of Sanctuary Fortress.

3545.name: Wrathful Gaze
3545.explain: A creature that is hard to deal with. Can be produced in the designated building of Sanctuary Fortress.

3546.name: Transfer Robot
3546.explain: A quite efficient helper to construct buildings. Can be produced in the designated building of Sanctuary Fortress.

3547.name: Refined Polymer
3547.explain: A purified resource material that needs a special container to maintain its stability. Can be produced in the designated building of Sanctuary Fortress.

3548.name: Mystic Crystal
3548.explain: An extremely rare crystal found in dreams. Can be produced in the designated building of Sanctuary Fortress.

3549.name: Gluttony's Tongue
3549.explain: It would not be wise to feed it. Can be produced in the designated building of Sanctuary Fortress.

3550.name: Fire Combat Unit
3550.explain: A basic building block of a battle robot. Can be produced in the designated building of Sanctuary Fortress.

3551.explain: A unique material of Star Soul. Can be used to upgrade designated Star Soul.
